post.summary: Retrieves the URL of manage, account settings and user profile page.

inherited.description: True if setting is inherited from its group or account value.

autoLoginUser.description: Auto LogIn Flag. If true, the URL returned will automatically log the user in. If false, the URL returned will require the credentials. By default its value is false

frameParent.description: An optional field to provide the comma-separated list of parent domain urls where the returned URLs may be iframed. If provided with non-empty and valid list of parent domain urls, it will be used to allow framing for the same. By default the value is null and the Acrobat Sign pages will not be viewable in an iframe.

noChrome.description: No Chrome Flag. If true, the embedded page is shown without a navigation header or footer. If false, the standard page header and footer will be present. By default its value is false

accountId.description: The account id of the user. This will be ignored as part of PUT calls.

accountType.description: Type of account to which the user belongs (null if no account). If provided in POST or PUT it will be ignored.

company.description: The name of company of the user

createdDate.description: The date the user was created. If provided in POST or PUT it will be ignored

email.description: The email address of the user

firstName.description: The first name of the user

id.description: A unique identifier of the user resource for REST APIs as issued by Acrobat Sign.

isAccountAdmin.description: True if the user is account admin. This will be ignored as part of PUT calls.

lastName.description: The last name of the user

locale.description: The UI locale of the user

phone.description: The phone number of the user

primaryGroupId.description: Primary group in which the new user should be added. Default is the default group for the account the user is being added to. This will be ignored as part of PUT calls

status.description: Status of the user. If provided in POST it will be ignored.

title.description: The job title of the user

nextCursor.description: Used to navigate to the next page. If notÂ returned, there are no further pages.

sendRestrictedToWorkflows.description: Can user only create agreeements using workflows?

userCanSend.description: Can user send agreements for signature to others?

userId.description: The unique identifier for user in REST APIs.
